title: Fork cord → @thesammykins/tether
description: Fork alexknowshtml/cord, rename to @thesammykins/tether. Refactor spawner into pluggable agent adapters (Claude Code, OpenCode, Codex CLI). Implement all 8 open GitHub issues: #1 allowlist, #2 ack emoji, #3 rate limiting, #4 session limits, #5 channel context, #6 smart thread naming, #7 exponential backoff, #8 pause/resume. Full test suite. Publish as @thesammykins/tether on npm.

description: When user says 'brb' in a thread, flag the session so the agent uses `tether ask` (CLI) to send questions to Discord as interactive buttons instead of built-in question tools. Includes a "Type answer" button for free-text responses.

Fix all 12 audit findings in tether
description: Address every bug, security issue, and cleanup item identified in the tether codebase audit. Covers API security, CLI fixes, message flow bugs, session persistence, dead code removal, and test coverage.

title: API security hardening + config unification + button/file fixes
CLI setup + agent detection fixes
description:
Fix 3 issues in bin/tether.ts and skills/tether/SKILL.md, plus add skill symlink to ~/.agents/skills:
1. PORT + AUTH: Align CLI with API on TETHER_API_PORT, add Authorization header when API_TOKEN is set.
2. SETUP PATH: Fix skills/cord → skills/tether reference.
3. AGENT CHECK: Check configured agent binary, not just claude.
4. SKILL SYMLINK: setup() should symlink the tether skill to ~/.agents/skills/tether (the new standard skill location).

title: Fix message flow: channel context injection, pause/resume replay, reset ordering
Persist OpenCode/Codex session IDs to database
description:
Fixed session ID persistence for OpenCode/Codex adapters. Added updateSessionId() function to db.ts that updates threads.session_id. Modified worker.ts to persist result.sessionId after adapter.spawn() returns if it differs from the initial sessionId. This ensures resume/continue functionality works for all adapters (OpenCode, Codex, Claude), not just Claude. Tests pass (148/149, 1 unrelated failure in adapter registry test).

Changes:
- src/db.ts: Added updateSessionId(threadId, sessionId) function
- src/worker.ts: Added import for updateSessionId and persistence logic after adapter.spawn()

Remediate Audit Findings: Security, Reliability, Correctness & CI/CD
description: Address 21 findings from full security/reliability audit of tether Discord bot. Risk-based strategy: isolate high-risk changes, write tests first, minimize blast radius. All 253 existing tests must remain green. Wave 1 (subtasks 0-4, 6) runs in parallel. Wave 2 (subtask 5) depends on subtask 0 completing first.

title: Subtask 0: Harden API Server — Auth, Error Handling, Payload Limits, Map Cleanup, Webhook HMAC
Subtask 1: Fix Bot Security — Path Traversal, Webhook Field Compat, Log Redaction, Graceful Shutdown
Subtask 2: Harden Worker — Prompt Injection, BRB Delimiters, Log Sanitization, Graceful Shutdown
Subtask 3: Fix Unbounded Maps — Rate Limiter, Session Limits, parseInt Safety, DB Cleanup
Subtask 4: Discord REST Resilience — Timeout, 429 Retry (JSON+Header), Jittered Backoff
Subtask 5: Harden CLI — Webhook Field, Password Input, Secrets via Stdin, Shutdown, Auth Headers
Subtask 6: Harden CI/CD — Blocking Typecheck, Dependency Audit, Dep Pinning Review
